author: CBR
description:
Wanda Maximoff’s Red Queen form is one of the most terrifying forces in the Marvel Universe. This video explains the zombie Scarlet Witch in full detail, from her Chaos Magic and psionic abilities to her shocking immunity to the Mind Stone.

We break down Zombie Wanda’s powers, including telekinesis, flight, energy shields, and her ability to command an undead army. You’ll see how she matches up against the Hulk, why Vision still matters, and what makes the Red Queen the most dangerous Marvel zombie. Along the way, we look back at her feats in Age of Ultron, WandaVision, and Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness to understand just how powerful she really is.

0:00 – Why Zombie Scarlet Witch Is So Broken
00:23 – MCU Scarlet Witch Power Set & Chaos Magic
02:11 – Psionics, Telekinesis, Flight & Shields
04:30 – Zombie Enhancements: Infection, Instinct & Pain Tolerance
08:40 – Hulk vs the Red Queen
10:19 – Weaknesses, Mind Stone Immunity & Vision
11:17 – Future Abilities & Reality-Wa
title: Scarlet Witch: Zombie Powers Explained
